name: Square Warfare (Fun Noober)
description:
This is a 2d endless top down shooter game I made in Godot in around 2-3 hours. The initial game-play loop took about 45 minutes to make and everything else was just polishing the game.

Not anything special just squares fighting squares. There is only 1 weapon type but there is a lot of polish that has went into this project.

Might as well  be considered finished so feel free to download.

Linux version is tested. Windows version was tested through Wine but I have no idea how it works on native Windows.
